description: The protest "burst" the idea that the Isle of Man was free of racism, its organiser says.
title: Black Lives Matter: More than 1,000 march in Manx protest
title_page: Black Lives Matter: More than 1,000 march in Manx protest - BBC News
maintext: Members of the public had been asked to submit their own experiences with racism prior to the event and several testimonies were read out by organisers following the march.
